You will learn how to do it on your own and he will provide you with all of the letters you will need for each scenario. Subscribed students will also be able to have unlimited guidance and tips from the instructor. He will provide his email to guide you through the whole process and answer all of your questions along the way. You will finally have the truth about credit repair and always have him there to guide you along the way. If you feel you cannot handle it on your own, you can hire his company to do it for you.
